thread.title: Thoughtful and Comfortable Hotel - Review
thread.title_full: Thoughtful and Comfortable Hotel - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Richard H
title: Thoughtful and Comfortable Hotel - Review
text:
My families and I came to Beijing with a long and tired travel. The team members, May, Celine, Elle and Rainy, in Lounge provide us such comfortable service to release our tired. My children were noisy cause they didn't sleep well. Ms. Rainy to play with thenm and helped us to keep them quiet. Next morning, Ms. May introduced the view points of Beijing and gave us some advises about Beijing touring. We are appreciated for their assist. And here I provide my recommend for this thoughtful and comfortable hotel.
Room Tip: Thoughtful and Comfortable Hotel See more room tips
